title: Danielle Lloyd's string of plastic surgery ops after vowing to give it up for good
text:

Danielle Lloyd has done a complete U-turn by getting a string of plastic surgery operations after vowing to give it up for good.

The former WAG showed off her new look - and confidence - by stripping naked for a photoshoot.

The 35-year-old vowed to give cosmetic surgery up for good following a botched boob job in 2012 resulted in one of her implants bursting open in the middle of the night.

She was rushed to hospital for emergency surgery and was left fighting for her life after losing six pints of blood.

She said that the time that she regretted going under the knife in the first place.

(Image: WireImage)

(Image: WireImage)

But now, she's done a complete U-turn by having a boob job, liposuction and a Brazilian bump lift to give her look an overhaul.

The mum-of-four told Closer magazine: "I can't wait to get my kit off! This is the most confident I've felt about my body in a long time.

"I know I said I wouldn't have more surgery, but I thought to myself, 'Do I actually give a s**t what people think?' I'm allowed to change my mind because I want to feel happy."

(Image: Getty Images)

Danielle flew to Turkey last month to have her "misshapen boobs" fixed and decided to get a bum lift done while she was there.

She told the mag: "I went there to get my boobs done and I wasn't expecting to have anything else. My surgeon said he needed to take fat from my stomach to reconstruct my left breast, but then he suggested putting some of the excess fat into my bum and hips to give me a nice shape. I said ,'Go on then, get it in there! Why not?'"

(Image: Getty Images for Nickelodeon Sli)

Danielle went on to say that despite her hard work in the gym, she's always had "a flat a**e", but now she loves her look.

Lately, Danielle, who used to be married to footballer Jamie O'Hara has become swept up in the war between Coleen Rooney and Rebekah Vardy.

Coleen accused Rebekah of selling stories on her, and she vehemently denies it.

Danielle told Mirror Online she had to speak out because the same thing has happened to her.
